argument.description: The value to convert to an INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND type. It can be a char, varchar2, nchar, or nvarchar2 value.
Optional. A decimal character and group separator value.

returnType: The TO_DSINTERVAL function returns a INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL TO_DSINTERVAL function converts a string to an INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND type.
